DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety stent implantation patient symptomatic extra- intracranial artery stenosis determine role secondary prevention ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Stent Implantation Symptomatic Extra- Intracranial Artery Stenosis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 40 yearold 75 yearold . 2 . Ischemic stroke related extra intracranial atherosclerosis stenosis , transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) , onset time within 90 day 3 . Implantation stent least 1 week stroke onset , patient 's medical condition stable , time limit TIA , 4 . Stenosed ICA MCA BA VA candidate artery stent implantation . 5 . Degree stenosis target artery range 51 % 99 % 6 . Modified Rankin score≤3 NIHSS Score ≤4 7 . Informed consent obtain . Patients exclude entry criterion list meet : 1 . Target stenosis artery suitable stent implantation evaluation . 2 . Previous carotid endarterectomy carotid artery stent , intracranial artery stent implantation . 3 . Ischemic stroke cause condition atherosclerosis . 4 . Documented nonatherosclerosis angiopathy . 5 . Clinically unstable time enrollment , 6 . Conditions may lead cardiogenic embolism : arterial fibrillation，left ventricular thrombus , Myocardiac infarction within 6 week , etc . 7 . Severe hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 180 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 110 mmHg ) 8 . Severe comorbid unstable medical condition , ie，severe heart failure , pulmonary failure renal failure , liver dysfunction ( serum liver enzyme twice normal level ) , malignancy likelihood death within next 2 year 9 . Significant memory behavioral disorder , ie , Alzheimer disease , etc.daily care need . 10 . Concurrent participation another clinical trial 11 . Unable return follow 12 . History hemorrhagic disease ( ie , intracranial hemorrhage , Idiopathic Thrombocytopenic Purpura , etc ) bleeding tendency condition . 13 . Intracranial arteriovenous malformation aneurysm .
